release.description: This release of the Tracking Service is a component of the integrated release 9.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Added REST-based interfaces to insert/update Product, Archive/Certification/NSSDCA statuses.
Added REST-based interfaces to insert/update Delivery, Role, and Users.
Added REST-based interfaces to insert/update Instrument, Investigation, and Node references.
Added REST-based interface to get a list of all products with the latest status for each product.
